name: hertfordshire
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a county (= an area with its own local government) in southeastern England: He is a psychologist at the University of Hertfordshire. The Woodland Trust is creating more than 850 acres of woodland near St Albans in Hertfordshire.
More examplesFewer examplesAround half a mile away was the small Hertfordshire town of Tring.This scene is in the Hertfordshire countryside about two hours north of London.Officers would be making house-to-house inquiries, said a Hertfordshire Police spokesman.
